alert.note: Alert for Bronx; Northern Nassau; Northern Queens; Northern Westchester; Southern Westchester (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 2:01AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN FAIRFIELD...SOUTHERN WESTCHESTER...QUEENS...BRONX AND NORTHWESTERN NASSAU COUNTIES THROUGH 245 AM EDT... At 201 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Throgs Neck Bridge, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Co-op City and Port Washington around 205 AM EDT. Glen Cove and Rye around 210 AM EDT. Port Chester and Greenwich around 215 AM EDT. Stamford around 225 AM EDT. New Canaan and Darien around 230 AM EDT. Norwalk around 235 AM EDT. Wilton around 240 AM EDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bronx; Northern Nassau; Northern Queens; Northern Westchester; Southern Westchester
